thread.title: 大塚愛「さくらんぼが好きじゃなかった」と告白 加藤浩次ショック
thread.title_full: 大塚愛「さくらんぼが好きじゃなかった」と告白 加藤浩次ショック

author: 中野渉
title: 大塚愛「さくらんぼが好きじゃなかった」と告白 加藤浩次ショック
text:   TOKYO - OCTOBER 30: Singer Ai Otsuka poses upon her arrival for 'Red Cliff Part 1' Pre-Opening Gala at Roppongi Hills on October 30, 2008 in Tokyo, Japan. The film will open on November 1 in Japan. (Photo by Kiyoshi Ota/Getty Images) TAIPEI, TAIWAN - DECEMBER 12: (CHINA OUT, TAIWAN OUT) Japanese pop singer and songwriter Ai Otsuka performs onstage during her concert on December 12, 2015 in Taipei, Taiwan of China. (Photo by VCG/VCG via Getty Images) TOKYO - DECEMBER 04: Ai Otsuka attends the Chanel Ginza 5th Anniversary Reception at Chanel Ginza on December 4, 2009 in Tokyo, Japan. (Photo by Koji Watanabe/Getty Images) Ai Otsuka performs at the Live Earth concert in Chiba, Japan July 7, 2007. Former US. vice president Al Gore and his global partners are staging the Live Earth concerts held on seven continents simultaneously to raise awareness of environmental issues. REUTERS/Michael Caronna (JAPAN) TAIPEI, TAIWAN - DECEMBER 12: (CHINA OUT, TAIWAN OUT) Japanese pop singer and songwriter Ai Otsuka performs onstage during her concert on December 12, 2015 in Taipei, Taiwan of China. (Photo by VCG/VCG via Getty Images) TAIPEI, TAIWAN - DECEMBER 12: (CHINA OUT, TAIWAN OUT) Japanese pop singer and songwriter Ai Otsuka performs onstage during her concert on December 12, 2015 in Taipei, Taiwan of China. (Photo by VCG/VCG via Getty Images) TAIPEI, TAIWAN - DECEMBER 12: (CHINA OUT, TAIWAN OUT) Japanese pop singer and songwriter Ai Otsuka performs onstage during her concert on December 12, 2015 in Taipei, Taiwan of China. (Photo by VCG/VCG via Getty Images) TAIWAN, CHINA - DECEMBER 13: (CHINA MAINLAND OUT)Ai Otsuka at her world tour concert in Taipei, Taiwan, China on 13th December, 2014.(Photo by TPG/Getty Images) TAIPEI, TAIWAN - DECEMBER 12: (CHINA OUT) Japanese singer Ai Otsuka arrives at Taipei Songshan Airport on December 12, 2014 in Taipei, Taiwan. (Photo by VCG/VCG via Getty Images) TOKYO - DECEMBER 04: Ai Otsuka attends the Chanel Ginza 5th Anniversary Reception at Chanel Ginza on December 4, 2009 in Tokyo, Japan. (Photo by Koji Watanabe/Getty Images) TOKYO - OCTOBER 30: Singer Ai Otsuka waves to fans upon her arrival for 'Red Cliff Part 1' Pre-Opening Gala at Roppongi Hills on October 30, 2008 in Tokyo, Japan. The film will open on November 1 in Japan. (Photo by Kiyoshi Ota/Getty Images) TOKYO - JULY 07: Ai Otsuka poses during press call at the Tokyo leg of the Live Earth series of concerts, at Makuhari Messe, Chiba on July 7, 2007 in Tokyo, Japan. (Photo by Tomokazu Tazawa/FilmMagic) TOKYO - JULY 07: Ai Otsuka poses during press call at the Tokyo leg of the Live Earth series of concerts, at Makuhari Messe, Chiba on July 7, 2007 in Tokyo, Japan. (Photo by Tomokazu Tazawa/FilmMagic) TAIPEI, TAIWAN - DECEMBER 12: (CHINA OUT) Japanese singer Ai Otsuka arrives at Taipei Songshan Airport on December 12, 2014 in Taipei, Taiwan. (Photo by VCG/VCG via Getty Images) TOKYO - JULY 07: Ai Otsuka poses during press call at the Tokyo leg of the Live Earth series of concerts, at Makuhari Messe, Chiba on July 7, 2007 in Tokyo, Japan. (Photo by Tomokazu Tazawa/FilmMagic) Singer Ai Otsuka performs on stage at the Tokyo leg of the Live Earth series of concerts, at Makuhari Messe, Chiba on July 7, 2007 in Tokyo, Japan. (Photo by Jun Sato/WireImage) TAIPEI, TAIWAN - DECEMBER 12: (CHINA OUT) Japanese singer Ai Otsuka arrives at Taipei Songshan Airport on December 12, 2014 in Taipei, Taiwan. (Photo by VCG/VCG via Getty Images) Singer Ai Otsuka performs on stage at the Tokyo leg of the Live Earth series of concerts, at Makuhari Messe, Chiba on July 7, 2007 in Tokyo, Japan. (Photo by Jun Sato/WireImage) Singer Ai Otsuka performs on stage at the Tokyo leg of the Live Earth series of concerts, at Makuhari Messe, Chiba on July 7, 2007 in Tokyo, Japan. (Photo by Jun Sato/WireImage) Ai Otsuka, winner of Best Pop Video during MTV Video Music Awards Japan 2007 - Press Room at Saitama Super Arena in Saitama, Japan. (Photo by Jun Sato/WireImage) Singer Ai Otsuka performs on stage at the Tokyo leg of the Live Earth series of concerts, at Makuhari Messe, Chiba on July 7, 2007 in Tokyo, Japan. (Photo by Jun Sato/WireImage) Singer Ai Otsuka performs on stage at the Tokyo leg of the Live Earth series of concerts, at Makuhari Messe, Chiba on July 7, 2007 in Tokyo, Japan. (Photo by Jun Sato/WireImage) TOKYO - JULY 07: Ai Otsuka poses during press call at the Tokyo leg of the Live Earth series of concerts, at Makuhari Messe, Chiba on July 7, 2007 in Tokyo, Japan. (Photo by Tomokazu Tazawa/FilmMagic) TOKYO - JULY 07: Ai Otsuka peforms on stage at the Tokyo leg of the Live Earth series of concerts, at Makuhari Messe, Chiba on July 7, 2007 in Tokyo, Japan. Launched by former US Vice President Al Gore to combat Global Warming, the concert is one of a series taking place over a 24-hour period on July 7 across seven continents. (Photo by Koichi Kamoshida/Getty Images) Singer Ai Otsuka performs on stage at the Tokyo leg of the Live Earth series of concerts, at Makuhari Messe, Chiba on July 7, 2007 in Tokyo, Japan. (Photo by Jun Sato/WireImage) TOKYO - JULY 07: Ai Otsuka poses during a photocall at the Tokyo leg of the Live Earth series of concerts, at Makuhari Messe, Chiba on July 7, 2007 in Tokyo, Japan. Launched by former US Vice President Al Gore to combat Global Warming, the concert is one of a series taking place over a 24-hour period on July 7 across seven continents. (Photo by Junko Kimura/Getty Images) TOKYO - JULY 07: Ai Otsuka peforms on stage at the Tokyo leg of the Live Earth series of concerts, at Makuhari Messe, Chiba on July 7, 2007 in Tokyo, Japan. Launched by former US Vice President Al Gore to combat Global Warming, the concert is one of a series taking place over a 24-hour period on July 7 across seven continents. (Photo by Koichi Kamoshida/Getty Images) Ai Otsuka, winner of Best Pop Video during MTV Video Music Awards Japan 2007 - Press Room at Saitama Super Arena in Saitama, Japan. (Photo by Jun Sato/WireImage) TOKYO - JULY 07: Ai Otsuka signs autographs at backstage at the Tokyo leg of the Live Earth series of concerts, at Makuhari Messe, Chiba on July 7, 2007 in Tokyo, Japan. Launched by former US Vice President Al Gore to combat Global Warming, the concert is one of a series taking place over a 24-hour period on July 7 across seven continents. (Photo by Koichi Kamoshida/Getty Images) TOKYO - JULY 07: Ai Otsuka is seen at backstage after pefoming at the Tokyo leg of the Live Earth series of concerts, at Makuhari Messe, Chiba on July 7, 2007 in Tokyo, Japan. Launched by former US Vice President Al Gore to combat Global Warming, the concert is one of a series taking place over a 24-hour period on July 7 across seven continents. (Photo by Koichi Kamoshida/Getty Images) Ai Otsuka, winner of Best Pop Video during MTV Video Music Awards Japan 2007 - Press Room at Saitama Super Arena in Saitama, Japan. (Photo by Jun Sato/WireImage) Ai Otsuka during MTV Video Music Awards Japan 2007 - Show at Saitama Super Arena in Saitama, Japan. (Photo by JIL Studio/FilmMagic)  シェア
